channel.title: Runescvape weekly post about rule 7!
channel.description: So i was think of maybe useing scripts and cutting alot of yews and stuff then selling the yews for gp and selling the gp by mills for money, so if they catch me doing it would my main get banned? im not going to be autoing on my main. If so how can i prevent this? and maybe instead of trading u could just drop it. so they dont catch you in a trade. would that work?

item.title: Runescvape weekly post about rule 7!
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

yes u will get band because they will count it as autoing and if your name is being payed off the same card as your main they will both be band so i would not do it and cut mages then selll for 1k each

Read full topic

item.title: Runescvape weekly post about rule 7!
item.dc:creator: @sidishere sidishere
item.description:
@sidishere wrote:

[quote=“Glory 4 Java, post:16, topic:92726”]jagex is really getting annoying with all of their annoying randoms and whatnot

they really just have to eliminate all of the chinese people who sit in sweatshops cutting trees for 10 peacos per 5 years to chop 10k yews a day on 1million accounts!!!

To get back at jagex we should all make an autoer and put on an autoer saying something really bad and parade through runescape for days lol…and whenever someone gets banned they just bring up a new one and tear jagex apart!!! just for fun :p[/quote]
i like the sound of that
whats the problem with jagex trying to stop people breaking the rules?

Read full topic

item.title: Runescvape weekly post about rule 7!
item.dc:creator: @legend_rene legend rene
item.description:
@legend_rene wrote:

They have been making a game wich people here are making copy’s of.
They are just trying to keep their game fair is that wrong?.. I dont think so…
Im sure if u had created RuneScape you would do exactly the same , so stop complaining about it ,
If u dont like it they are not forcing you to play it , just leave!

item.title: Runescvape weekly post about rule 7!
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“Mr.Chris, post:14, topic:92726”][quote author=Fall Out Boy link=topic=134805.msg1384882#msg1384882 date=1180305701]
I’m just wondering, but how do they get by looking through thousands of trade logs…? Is that why you’re not banned until about a week or two after you commit something?
[/quote]

It’s all automated. That’s why a few people are banned pretty unfairly.[/quote]

That system is probably automated, but people are not auto-banned. A Jagex mod confirmed it when my friend sent a message to him about it.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescvape weekly post about rule 7!
item.dc:creator: @iluvrs iluvrs
item.description:
@iluvrs wrote:

Wait will someone please tell me if this would work, You know how you can use unsinged java? well use that and then get my mains str to 95, then ill stake till i got 10+m aday. I then do a drop trade to my friends account, it wont really be a drop trade though. he i will drop it he will pick it up. then i go on my dads laptop but off are wireless internet. Will it have the same ips so they can track me? then my friends drops the mnoey and my lvl 3 i will have just made picks the cash of and does a drop trade with the person who is buying. wil lthat work? is it bullet proof? i have used my main accoutnt on my dads laptop a few times wil that effect anything?

Read full topic
